description: HashiCorp Waypoint - application build, deploy, and release workflow

common_errors.cause: Unable to connect to Waypoint server
common_errors.solution: Check WAYPOINT_SERVER_ADDR is set correctly, verify server is running, check network/firewall

common_errors.cause: Waypoint authentication token is invalid or missing
common_errors.solution: Run 'waypoint login' or 'waypoint token new' to obtain valid token
Check build configuration in waypoint.hcl, verify Dockerfile or buildpack setup, review build logs

common_errors.cause: Error during deployment to target platform
common_errors.solution: Check platform credentials, verify target cluster/service is accessible, review deploy configuration

common_errors.cause: Failed to push built image to container registry
common_errors.solution: Check registry credentials, verify registry URL, ensure image name is valid

common_errors.cause: Syntax or configuration error in waypoint.hcl
common_errors.solution: Validate waypoint.hcl syntax, check required fields are present, review HCL formatting

common_errors.cause: Waypoint plugin failed to load or execute
common_errors.solution: Check plugin is installed, verify plugin version compatibility, review plugin configuration
Check releaser configuration, verify load balancer/ingress setup, review release logs

common_errors.cause: Specified project or application does not exist
common_errors.solution: Run 'waypoint init' to initialize project, check project/app name spelling

common_errors.cause: Waypoint runner is not available or failed
common_errors.solution: Check runner is deployed and running, verify runner-server connectivity, review runner logs
